statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_financial_analysis;
SELECT date, revenue, expenses FROM hotel_financial_analysis;
SELECT * FROM hotel_financial_analysis WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM hotel_financial_analysis ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM hotel_financial_analysis;
SELECT * FROM hotel_financial_analysis ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC, expenses DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM hotel_financial_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT DISTINCT date, (revenue - expenses) AS profit_loss FROM hotel_financial_analysis WHERE profit_loss > 0 ORDER BY profit_loss DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, revenue, expenses, (revenue - expenses) AS net_profit FROM hotel_financial_analysis ORDER BY net_profit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM hotel_financial_analysis WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY revenue - expenses DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM revenue;
SELECT date, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_revenue FROM revenue;
SELECT date, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT revenue_id, date, amount FROM revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND amount <= 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue;
SELECT R.date, R.amount, E.description FROM revenue R INNER JOIN expenses E ON R.date = E.date WHERE R.amount > E.amount;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_expenses FROM expenses WHERE date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, amount FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Office Supplies';
SELECT total_revenue, total_expenses, net_profit FROM FinancialAnalysis WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, date, amount FROM Revenue WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM Expenses WHERE category LIKE '%Marketing%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(total_expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(net_profit) AS net_profit FROM FinancialAnalysis;
SELECT date, category, amount FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM Revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, room_number FROM guests WHERE check_in_date = '2022-09-10';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE rate BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guests WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY check_in_date;
SELECT room_number, type, rate FROM rooms WHERE rate BETWEEN 100 AND 150 ORDER BY room_number;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY id;
SELECT guest_id, name, check_in_date FROM guests WHERE check_out_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_tracking;
SELECT revenue_id, amount FROM revenue_tracking ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM expense_tracking WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM hotel_guests WHERE check_in < '2022-06-01';
SELECT staff_name, position, salary FROM staff_payroll WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM revenue_tracking;
SELECT revenue_id, description, amount FROM revenue_tracking WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in FROM hotel_guests ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT staff_name, position, salary FROM staff_payroll WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT room_type, rate FROM room_rates WHERE rate BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY rate ASC;
